item.title: Authority & Merit
item.author: xheavey@gmail.com (Allen Heavey)
item.description: @reference: Medium An email to the team at Square. Subject: Authority & Merit From: Jack Dorsey X-Mailer: iPhone Mail (9B206) Date: Wed, 5 Sep 2012 15:08:02 -0700 To: Square Squares, I’ve noticed a funny thing in the company. There’s been a high occurrence of folks using names, mine for instance, to push through an idea. “Jack really wants this to happen, Jack thinks this is an amazing idea, Jack said, etc.
